mapper.select: select c.nombre as cnom, c.documento as cdoc, c.telefono as ctel, c.direccion as cdir, c.email as cema, c.vetado as cvet from VI_CLIENTES as c where c.documento=#{idcli};

select
c.nombre as cnom, c.documento as cdoc, c.telefono as ctel, c.direccion as cdir, c.email as cema, c.vetado as cvet,
ir.id as irid, ir.fechainiciorenta as irfi, ir.fechafinrenta as irff,
i.id as iid, i.nombre as inom, i.descripcion as ides, i.fechalanzamiento as ifl, i.tarifaxdia as itxd, i.formatorenta as ifr, i.genero as ig, ti.id as tiid, ti.descripcion as tides
FROM VI_CLIENTES as c left join VI_ITEMRENTADO as ir on c.documento=ir.CLIENTES_documento left join VI_ITEMS as i on ir.ITEMS_id=i.id left join VI_TIPOITEM as ti on i.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id
